title: Goose risotto
description: Who doesn't love creamy risotto? Top with leftover goose for a delicious Boxing Day meal. This is a great recipe for using up leftover turkey too.
ingredients: 400g/14½oz risotto rice (such as arborio or carnaroli)
1 tbsp chopped mixed fresh herbs (sage, rosemary, parsley, tarragon, chives)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
